WSCp MATT 7.27 Þa rinde hit
WSCp MARK 1.1 Her ys godspellys angyn hælyndes Cristes Godes suna.
WSCp MARK 1.2 Swa awriten is on þæs witegan bec Isaiam,
nu ic asende minne engel beforan þinre ansyne, Se gegearwað þinne weg beforan ðe.
WSCp MARK 1.3 Clypiende stefn on þam westene
gegearwiað Drihtnes weg,
doð rihte his siðas.
WSCp MARK 1.4 Iohannes wæs on westene fulligende & bodiende dædbote fulwiht on synna forgyfenesse.
WSCp MARK 1.5 & to him ferde eall Iudeisc rice, & ealle Hierosolimaware, & wæron fram him gefullode on Iordanes flode hyra synna anddettenne.
WSCp MARK 1.6 And Iohannes wæs gescryd mid oluendes hærum,
& fellen gyrdel wæs ymbe his lendenu,
& gærstapan & wudu hunig he æt.
WSCp MARK 1.7 & he bodude & cwæð,
strengra cymð æfter me, þæs ne eom ic wyrðe þæt ic his sceona þwanga bugende uncnytte.
WSCp MARK 1.8 Ic fullige eow on wætere,
he eow fullað on halgum gaste.
WSCp MARK 1.9 & on ðam dagum com se hælend fram Nazareth Galilee & wæs gefullod on Iordane fram Iohanne.
WSCp MARK 1.10 & sona of ðam wætere he geseah opene heofonas, & haligne gast swa culfran astigende & on him wunigende.
WSCp MARK 1.11 & þa wæs stefn of heofenum geworden,
þu eart min gelufoda sunu,
on þe ic gelicode.
WSCp MARK 1.12 And sona gast hine on westen genydde.
WSCp MARK 1.13 & he on westene wæs feowertig daga & feowertig nihta,
& he wæs fram Satane gecostnod;
& he mid wilddeorum wæs
& him englas þenodon.
WSCp MARK 1.14 Syððan Iohannes geseald wæs, com se hælend on Galileam Godes rices, godspell bodigende. WSCp MARK 1.15 & þus cweðende,
witodlice tid is gefylled
& heofena rice genealæcð;
Doð dædbote
& gelyfaþ þam godspelle.
WSCp MARK 1.16 & þa he ferde wið þa Galileiscan Sæ, he geseah Simonem & Andream his broðor hyra nett on þa sæ lætende;
Soðlice hi wæron fisceras.
WSCp MARK 1.17 And þa cwæð se hælend,
cumað æfter me
& ic do inc þæt gyt beoð sawla onfonde.
WSCp MARK 1.18 & hi þa hrædlice him fyligdon, & forleton heora net.
WSCp MARK 1.19 & ðanon hwon agan he geseah Iacobum & Zebedei & Iohannes his broðor,
& hi on heora scype heora nett logodon.
WSCp MARK 1.20 & he hi sona clypode,
& hi heora fæder Zebedeo on scipe forleton mid hyrlingum. WSCp MARK 1.21 & ferdon to Cafarnaum
& sona restedagum he lærde hi on gesamnunge ingancgende.
WSCp MARK 1.22 & hi wundredon be his lare;
Soþlice he wæs hi lærende swa se þe anweald hæfð, næs swa boceras.
WSCp MARK 1.23 & on heora gesamnunge wæs sum man on unclænum gaste
& he hrymde. WSCp MARK 1.24 & cwæð,
eala Nazarenisca hælend, hwæt is us & þe;
Com ðu us to forspillanne;
Ic wat þu eart Godes halga.
WSCp MARK 1.25 Ða cidde se hælend him & cwæð,
adumba, & ga of þisum men.
WSCp MARK 1.26 & se unclæna gast hine slitende & mycelre stefne clypiende him of eode.
WSCp MARK 1.27 Þa wundredon hi ealle swa þæt hi betwux him cwædon,
hwæt ys þis;
Hwæt is þeos niwe lar, þæt he on anwealde unclænum gastum bebyt, & hi hyrsumiað him?
WSCp MARK 1.28 & sona ferde his hlisa to Galilea rice.
WSCp MARK 1.29 Hrædlice of hyra gesamnunge hi comon on Simonis & Andreas hus, mid Iacobe & Iohanne.
WSCp MARK 1.30 Soðlice þa sæt Simonis swegr hriðigende
& hi him be hyre sædon.
WSCp MARK 1.31 & genealæcende he hi up ahof hyre handa gegripenre,
& hrædlice se fefor hi forlet,
& heo þenode him.
WSCp MARK 1.32 Soðlice þa hit wæs æfen geworden þa sunne to setle eode, hi brohton to him ealle þa unhalan, & þa ðe wode wæron,
& eall seo burhwaru wæs gegaderod to þære duran.
WSCp MARK 1.34 & he manega gehælde þe missenlicum adlum gedrehte wæron,
& manega deofolseocnyssa he ut adraf; & hi sprecan ne let, forþam hi wiston þæt he Crist wæs.
WSCp MARK 1.35 And swiðe ær arisende he ferde on weste stowe & hine þar gebæd.
WSCp MARK 1.36 & him fyligde Simon & þa ðe mid him wæron.
WSCp MARK 1.37 & þa hi hine gemetton hi sædon him,
eall þis folc ðe secð.
WSCp MARK 1.38 Þa cwæð he,
fare we on gehende tunas & ceastra þæt ic ðar bodige;
